verses.verse: Woe <WH1945> to them that devise<WH2803> iniquity<WH205> and work<WH6466> evil<WH7451> upon their beds<WH4904>! when the morning<WH1242> is light<WH216>, they practise<WH6213> it<WH3426>, because it is in the power<WH410> of their hand<WH3027>.

And they covet<WH2530> fields<WH7704>, and seize<WH1497> them<WH1004>; and houses, and take them away<WH5375>: and they oppress<WH6231> a man<WH1397> and his house<WH1004>, even a man<WH376> and his heritage<WH5159>.

Therefore thus saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068>: Behold<WH4940>, against this family do I devise<WH2803> an evil<WH7451>, from which ye shall not remove<WH4185> your necks<WH6677>, neither shall ye walk<WH3212> haughtily<WH7317>; for it is an evil<WH7451> time<WH6256>.

In that day<WH3117> shall they take up<WH5375> a parable<WH4912> against you<WH5091>, and lament with a doleful<WH5093> lamentation<WH5092>, and say<WH559>, We are utterly<WH7703> ruined<WH7703>: he changeth<WH4171> the portion<WH2506> of my people<WH5971>: how doth he remove<WH4185> it from me<WH7725>! to the rebellious he divideth<WH2505> our fields<WH7704>.
Therefore thou shalt have none that shall cast<WH7993> the line<WH2256> by lot<WH1486> in the assembly<WH6951> of Jehovah<WH3068>.
Prophesy <WH5197> ye not<WH5197>, thus they prophesy. They shall not prophesy<WH5197> to these<WH3639>: reproaches shall not depart<WH5253>.

Shall it be said<WH559>, O house<WH1004> of Jacob<WH3290>, Is the Spirit<WH7307> of Jehovah<WH3068> straitened<WH7114>? are these his doings<WH4611>? Do not my words<WH1697> do good<WH3190> to him that walketh<WH1980> uprightly<WH3477>?

But of late<WH865> my people<WH5971> is risen up<WH6965> as an enemy<WH341>: ye strip<WH6584> the robe<WH145> from off<WH4136> the garment<WH8008> from them that pass<WH5674> by securely<WH983> as men averse<WH7725> from war<WH4421>.
The women<WH802> of my people<WH5971> ye cast out<WH1644> from their pleasant<WH8588> houses<WH1004>; from their young children<WH5768> ye take away<WH3947> my glory<WH1926> for ever<WH5769>.
Arise <WH6965> ye<WH3212>, and depart; for this is not your resting-place<WH4496>; because of uncleanness<WH2930> that destroyeth<WH2254>, even with a grievous<WH4834> destruction<WH2254>.

If <WH3863> a man<WH376> walking<WH1980> in a spirit<WH7307> of falsehood<WH8267> do lie<WH3576>, saying<WH5197>, I will prophesy unto thee of wine<WH3196> and of strong drink<WH7941>; he shall even be the prophet<WH5197> of this people<WH5971>.

I will surely<WH622> assemble<WH622>, O Jacob<WH3290>, all of thee<WH6908>; I will surely gather<WH6908> the remnant<WH7611> of Israel<WH3478>; I will put<WH7760> them together<WH3162> as the sheep<WH6629> of Bozrah<WH1223>, as a flock<WH5739> in the midst<WH8432> of their pasture<WH1699>; they shall make great noise<WH1949> by reason of the multitude of men<WH120>.

The breaker<WH6555> is gone up<WH5927> before<WH6440> them<WH6555>: they have broken forth and passed on<WH5674> to the gate<WH8179>, and are gone out<WH3318> thereat<WH4428>; and their king is passed<WH5674> on before<WH6440> them<WH3068>, and Jehovah at the head of them<WH7218>.
